strategy: AlphaWhale 100% first, then MediGuard, RailSense deferred

work_packages.title: Monorepo Foundation Scaffold
work_packages.description: Set up Nx monorepo with Poetry, pnpm, and folder hierarchy

work_packages.title: py-core Shared Library
work_packages.description: Config management, logging utilities, custom exceptions, first unit tests

work_packages.title: CI Pipeline
work_packages.description: GitHub Actions with 4 parallel jobs: pytest, ruff, bandit, mypy

work_packages.title: ts-core and Shared Frontend Scaffold
work_packages.description: Zod schemas mirroring Pydantic models, Next.js project setup with shadcn/ui design system, shared layout, sidebar navigation, and routing for all projects (/alphawhale, /mediguard, /railsense)

work_packages.title: Docker Base Images
work_packages.description: Python and Node base images with proper layering and caching

work_packages.title: MkDocs Documentation Site
work_packages.description: MkDocs Material setup for internal technical documentation

work_packages.title: LangChain Hello World
work_packages.description: Build 3-4 simple tools (calculate_rsi, fetch_btc_price, get_market_summary) and connect them to a ChatModel. Understand how LLMs choose tools based on docstrings and Pydantic auto-schema from type hints.

work_packages.title: BigQuery Data Ingestion
work_packages.description: Connect to financial data sources, ingest raw market data to BigQuery

work_packages.title: Airflow Hello World
work_packages.description: Learn Airflow concepts (DAGs, Tasks, Operators), set up local environment via Docker Compose with Astro CLI, write first DAG, understand the scheduler

work_packages.title: Databricks Feature Engineering
work_packages.description: Delta Tables, Silver to Gold transformations, trading features (RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands)

work_packages.title: LangGraph Hello World
work_packages.description: Build a minimal StateGraph: receives a question, decides to call a tool or respond, returns answer. Learn StateGraph, nodes, edges, conditional routing, and ToolNode.

work_packages.title: WhatsApp Human-in-Loop
work_packages.description: Evolution API integration for trade approval notifications, webhook receivers, connecting approval flow to LangGraph interrupt_before, async state resumption

work_packages.title: LangSmith Observability
work_packages.description: Tracing setup, viewing thought chains, understanding token usage and latency. Wire before building the real agent so every experiment is traced.

work_packages.title: AlphaWhale Frontend Views
work_packages.description: Add AlphaWhale-specific views to the shared Next.js app: chat interface, crypto screening dashboard, real-time agent state visualization, embedded LangSmith trace viewer

work_packages.title: AlphaWhale Integration Testing
work_packages.description: End-to-end flow: data pipeline, agent reasoning, WhatsApp alert, human approval, agent continues. Pytest integration tests.

work_packages.title: 123 Strategy and Backtests
work_packages.description: Implement the 1-2-3 trading strategy, basic backtesting framework with vectorbt or manual pandas, connecting strategy signals to agent decision logic

work_packages.title: Polymarket API Integration
work_packages.description: Add Polymarket API for market sentiment insights

work_packages.title: Statistical Treatment on Data
work_packages.description: Weibull distributions, statistical analysis on trading data

work_packages.title: FastMCP Refactor
work_packages.description: Extract AlphaWhale @tool functions into a FastMCP server. Connect LangGraph via langchain-mcp-adapters. Demo the same tools in Claude Desktop.

work_packages.title: Airflow Bronze to Silver DAG
work_packages.description: Build the actual Bronze to Silver transformation DAG: PythonOperator for BigQuery extraction, Pydantic data validation, Silver layer cleaning (dedup, type casting, null handling), task dependencies and retries

work_packages.title: AlphaWhale Agent v1
work_packages.description: Multi-tool LangGraph agent with screening node, analysis node, risk assessment node, human-in-loop checkpoint. State management with TypedDict. Conditional edges for risk-based human approval.

work_packages.title: n8n Agent Orchestration
work_packages.description: Integrate n8n as a workflow orchestration layer for agent triggers and notifications. Connect agent workflows via webhooks, route notifications through n8n pipelines.

work_packages.title: FHIR API Integration
work_packages.description: Connect to FHIR endpoints, parse clinical resources

work_packages.title: HuggingFace PII Masking
work_packages.description: Local PII detection and redaction using transformer models

work_packages.title: AWS S3 and Lambda Pipeline
work_packages.description: Document ingestion pipeline with S3 triggers and Lambda processing

work_packages.title: LlamaIndex Medical RAG
work_packages.description: Advanced medical document retrieval with citation tracking

work_packages.title: Pinecone Vector Store
work_packages.description: Serverless vector database setup with medical embeddings

work_packages.title: LangGraph Clinical Query Agent
work_packages.description: Query routing, source validation, and response generation

work_packages.title: MediGuard Frontend Views
work_packages.description: Add MediGuard-specific views to the shared Next.js app: clinical query interface, document upload, RAG responses with citations, PII redaction visualization, audit log viewer

work_packages.title: MediGuard Compliance Testing
work_packages.description: PHI handling validation, security scanning, audit trails

work_packages.title: Kafka Darwin Feed Consumer
work_packages.description: Real-time UK Rail Darwin push port consumer

work_packages.title: Bronze Layer Raw Events
work_packages.description: Raw event storage with schema evolution support

work_packages.title: Silver Layer Cleaned Data
work_packages.description: Data cleansing, deduplication, and conforming

work_packages.title: PyTorch LSTM Delay Predictor
work_packages.description: Custom LSTM model for train delay prediction

work_packages.title: Gold Layer Features and Vectors
work_packages.description: ML-ready features and embedding vectors

work_packages.title: CrewAI Maintenance Crew
work_packages.description: Automated maintenance task assignment and coordination

work_packages.title: RailSense Frontend Views
work_packages.description: Add RailSense-specific views to the shared Next.js app: real-time delay predictions dashboard, route/station map, historical patterns, live Darwin data feed. Supabase as real-time backend data layer.

work_packages.title: Terraform Infrastructure
work_packages.description: Infrastructure as Code for all RailSense cloud resources

work_packages.title: RailSense Load Testing
work_packages.description: High-volume stream testing and optimization

work_packages.title: Portfolio README and Architecture Diagrams
work_packages.description: Compelling README with Mermaid architecture diagrams, architecture decision records, and project storytelling

work_packages.title: Demo Videos
work_packages.description: Screen recordings: agent reasoning, WhatsApp flow, LangSmith traces, MCP in Claude Desktop

work_packages.title: Deploy to Railway/Render
work_packages.description: Deploy the full stack (API, dashboard, agent) with environment management and production secrets

work_packages.title: MkDocs Polish
work_packages.description: Final documentation pass: API docs, setup guides, architecture explanations

work_packages.title: Portfolio Landing Page
work_packages.description: The '/' route of the unified Next.js app. Showcases all three projects, architecture diagrams, demo videos, and key technologies. Built with Claude frontend skill.
